name: Iron Shell Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the near-legendary hulls employed by the Iron Shell.

name: Celeste Family Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce unique technology of the Celeste Family.

name: Barracuda Balance Container
desc: An old piece of terraforming hardware capable of regulating water conditions in a large area in the absence of a vast established ecosystem. This particular unit has been configured to emulate the water conditions of Jangala. It seems to be quite heavy for some reason.
